data.approach: Implement user template storage in ~/.config/jat/templates/ with CRUD operations, integrate with existing commandTemplates.ts system, and add dashboard UI for template management

summary: Created userTemplates.ts utility with full CRUD operations for user templates
Added REST API endpoints: GET/POST /api/templates, GET/PUT/DELETE /api/templates/[id]
Updated CommandTemplates.svelte to display both built-in and user templates
Extended commandTemplates.ts with ExtendedTemplate type and helper functions
Added comprehensive User Templates documentation to dashboard/CLAUDE.md

suggestedTasks.title: Add template management UI in config page
suggestedTasks.description: Create a dedicated template management section in /config?tab=templates with create, edit, delete UI for user templates
suggestedTasks.reason: API and utility functions exist but no full management UI yet

suggestedTasks.title: Add template import/export UI
suggestedTasks.description: Add buttons to export templates as JSON and import from JSON files for template sharing
suggestedTasks.reason: Import/export functions exist in userTemplates.ts but not exposed in UI

patterns: User templates stored as JSON in ~/.config/jat/templates/{id}.json
Use ExtendedTemplate type for combining built-in and user templates
Template IDs must be 2-64 chars, alphanumeric with hyphens/underscores
gotchas: saveUserTemplate() sets isUserTemplate internally - dont pass it in
frontmatter can be undefined in template files - provide default empty object
